metadata.title: CVE-2020-36183 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.8 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related toorg.docx4j.org.apache.xalan.lib.sql.JNDIConnectionPool.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
